abstract: Grace Notes column; profile of Betsy Pinover Schiff, landscape photographer whose books of images taken around New York City include Windows on Central Park: The Landscape Revealed; Schiff says city is becoming so green that she hardly recognizes some blocks from her earlier works.
lead_paragraph: Betsy Pinover Schiff, a photographer who has long believed in adding more plant life to New York’s streetscape, says the city is becoming so green that she hardly recognizes some blocks.

headline.main: Champion of Gardens in New York Savors a Lush Victory Lap
headline.print_headline: A Champion of Gardens in New York Savors a Lush Victory Lap

snippet: Betsy Pinover Schiff, a photographer who has long believed in adding more plant life to New York’s streetscape, says the city is becoming so green that she hardly recognizes some blocks.

keywords.value: Windows on Central Park: The Landscape Revealed (Book)
